alert.note: Alert for Foard; Knox (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 23 at 10:56PM CDT until June 24 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN FOARD AND KNOX COUNTIES... At 1056 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles west of Crowell to 4 miles south of Gilliland to 3 miles south of Munday, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Munday, Knox City, Benjamin, Goree, Vera, Truscott, Gilliland, and Rhineland. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
